name: Vegetarian Risotto
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add rice and cook according to package instructions. Set aside.

Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook onion and garlic for 3 minutes, then add carrots and cook for 5 minutes. Add cherry tomatoes, red and yellow bell peppers and cook for 3 more minutes.
Add rice and mix well. Season with salt, parsley and sage and serve while warm.

name: Hash Browns
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 2 quart baking dish.
Place the hash brown potatoes in the bottom of the baking dish.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook and stir the sausage and onion until the sausage is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink, drain.
Meanwhile, whisk together the eggs, milk, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper, and pour over the potatoes.
Layer with half the Cheddar cheese, the sausage mixture, and the remaining Cheddar cheese. Cover with aluminum foil.
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour. Remove cover, return casserole to the oven and bake for 10 minutes more.

name: Corned Beef Hash
instructions: Place corned beef in a large pot and cover with water. Cover pot and bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer. Cook 30 minutes.
Place potatoes in a skillet and fill it with water. Add salt and bring to a boil. Cook for about 20 minutes, until potatoes are tender.
Heat butter in a large skillet on medium heat. Add the onion and cook a few minutes, until translucent.
Mix in the chopped corned beef and potatoes. Spread out evenly over the pan. Increase the heat to high or medium-high and press down on the mixture with a metal spatula. Cook until nicely browned.
Remove from heat, stir in chopped parsley. Add plenty of freshly ground black pepper, and add salt to taste.

name: Vegan Potato Gratin
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Grease a baking dish and set aside.
In a saucepan, add the butter and place it over medium heat. Once melted, add the onions and garlic and cook until softened.
Add the flour and cook for another two minutes. Reduce the heat to low, then slowly add the milk and vegetable broth while continuing to whisk.
Once all the liquid has been added, bring everything to a boil. Add the salt and pepper and let it boil until it has thickened. Remove the saucepan from the heat.
Place a third of the sliced potatoes onto the base of the baking dish. Season with salt and pepper.
Pour a third of the cream sauce on top. Repeat the layers until it ends with the remaining sauce. Bake for 35 minutes and serve.

name: Mashed Potatoes With Kale, Cabbage And Green Onions
instructions: Put the potatoes in a medium pot and cover with cold water by at least an inch. Add 2 tbsp of salt, and bring to a boil. Boil for 20 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Return the pot to the stove and set over medium-high heat. Melt the butter in the pot and once it's hot, add the greens. Cook for 3 minutes. Add green onion and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in the milk, cornstarch and add potatoes. Reduce the heat to medium. Use a fork or potato masher and mash the potatoes, mixing them up with the greens.
Add salt to taste and serve hot, with a knob of butter in the center.

name: Tuna-Garlic Omelette
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Add oil to the pan and heat over medium heat. Add garlic and onion and cook for 2 minutes. Add the tuna and cook for 10 more minutes.
Add eggs, salt and pepper. Cook for 10 minutes on each side. Setve immediately.

name: Spinach-Mushroom Pepper Egg Muffins
instructions: Pre-heat oven to 350ºF.
Grease a muffin pan with coconut oil.
In a large bowl, add onion, pepper, mushrooms and spinach.
Mix well.
Scoop mixture into muffin pan, distributing evenly.
In the same bowl, add eggs.
Beat eggs thoroughly.
Add salt and mix well.
Distribute egg mixture evenly into the muffin pan.
Place pan in oven and bake for 20-25 minutes or until eggs are set.

name: Hasselback Potatoes
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Put the bacon in a pan on a medium heat. When the fat starts to run out from the bacon, increase the heat and cook for 1 minute on each side. Set aside.
Place a potato on a cutting board between two chopsticks or skewers. Slice the potatoes into ¼ inch slices, but do not slide the knife all the way down.
Rub each potato with the olive oil and generously season with salt and pepper.
Slice the butter into thin slices and place the butter pieces in between slices of potato. Place the potatoes onto the prepared baking sheet.
Transfer the baking sheet to the oven and bake for about an hour, or until potatoes are cooked through.
Top with sour cream, bacon, and shallots, and serve.

name: Spicy Rice
instructions: Bring water to a boil. Cook rice according to package directions, fluff with a fork, and set aside.
Add 1 tbsp oil to wok and increase heat to high. Add carrots and stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Stir in garlic and ginger. Add beef and cook until browned, 5 minutes,
Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil. Stir in rice until heated through. Garnish with some parsley and serve.

name: Zucchini Egg Muffins
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Combine ingredients in a large bowl. Scoop mixture into mini muffin tins coated to prevent sticking.
Press the mixture down with the back of a spoon to tightly compact in each muffin tin well.
Bake for 20 minutes or until firm and starting to brown.

name: Mushroom Soup
instructions: In a large saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium-high heat. Saute mushrooms and onion until tender.
Mix flour, salt, pepper and broth until smooth; stir into mushroom mixture.
Bring to a boil. Cook and stir until thickened, about 2 minutes. Reduce heat; stir in cream. and carrot.
Simmer, uncovered, until flavors are blended, about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.

name: Oven Scrambled Eggs With Bacon
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
Pour melted ghee into a baking dish. In a large bowl, whisk together eggs and salt until well blended.
Gradually whisk in milk. Pour egg mixture into the baking dish. Add bacon on top.
Bake uncovered for 10 minutes, then stir, and bake an additional 10 to 15 minutes.

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
instructions: In a medium saucepan bring water to a boil. Add rice,  and a pinch of salt. Cook, covered, about 15 minutes, fluff with a fork, and set aside.
Add kimchi to a pan and cook for 1 minute. Fold in rice and break up using a wooden spoon. Mix in remaining kimchi juice, until well combined.
Crack eggs into pan. Cook 3 minutes, or until white is set and edges are crisp and golden.
Fry until warmed through, about 5 minutes. Turn off the heat, stir in olive oil and divide among 2 bowls and serve with fried egg on top.

name: Omelette With Cauliflower And Parsley
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Whisk together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Heat a non-stick pan up to a moderate heat and add half of the oil.
Pour in the egg mixture and cook until almost set, then flip and cook for a minute more. When the omelette is cooked, transfer to a plate.
Add oil to the pan. Add cauliflower and parsley and cook for 3 minutes.
Top half of the omelette with ¾ of the cauliflower-parsley mixture, then fold the omelette and top with the remaining.

name: Kimchi Soup
ingredientLines: 2 cups kimchi, cut into bite-size pieces
1/2 pound boneless pork shoulder, cut into bite-size pieces

name: Soy Garlic Pork Chops
instructions: Preheat the over to 390°F.
Season and oil the potatoes and place them in the oven for 35 minutes. Add the broccoli and bake for another 10 minutes.
Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.
Whisk tomato sauce, soy sauce, and garlic together in a bowl to make a glaze.
Sear the pork chops on both sides on the preheated grill. Lightly brush glaze onto each side of the chops as they cook, grill until no longer pink in the center, about 7 to 9 minutes per side.

name: Stewed Cabbage With Meatballs
instructions: Heat the oven up to 400°F.
In a medium skillet bring water to a boil and cook rice according to package directions.
Saute onion, bell pepper and carrot in oil in a skillet with a heavy bottom for about 2 minutes.
Add chopped cabbage and keep cooking until softened, about 5 more minutes.
Add diced canned tomatoes, tomato sauce, and cook together on medium heat for 5 minutes.
Make the meatballs. In a large bowl mix together raw ground meat, cooked brown rice, the egg, garlic, paprika, salt and pepper and mix.
Drop the meat and rice mixture balls onto a tray or a plate and roll into meatballs the size of a golf ball with wet fingers.
Pour half of the cabbage tomato sauce in a casserole dish. Place the raw meatballs in the sauce in one layer, top with remaining sauce, and cover with tin foil.
Bake for 40 minutes, and serve.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: In a large wok, over medium heat, heat the oil. Add the vegetable and stir fry about 3 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Add the garlic and ginger and cook until fragrant.
In a small bowl, combine all the ingredients for the stir fry sauce. Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir.
Turn heat down to medium/low and cook 3-4 minutes, until sauce thickens and vegetables are desired tenderness.

name: Rice With Zucchini And Rice
instructions: Put olive oil into a pan and heat. Then add garlic. When the garlic starts to color, add the rice. Stir for a while. Then add the water and salt.
Cook over high heat for 5 minutes, then reduce and simmer for 5 more minutes.
Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet. Add the onion and mushrooms and fry over medium heat for 5 minutes, stirring often.
Add the zucchini and continue to cook for 5 more minutes. Season with a small sprinkling of salt.
Finish by adding rice. Stir the ingredients, let cook for 2 more minutes, and then serve on a plate.

name: Spanish-Style Tortilla With Potatoes And Spinach
ingredientLines: 1 lb large potatoes, peeled and cut into rounds
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
Heat the olive oil in a 10-inch cast-iron skillet over medium heat.
Add the potatoes, onion, and salt, stirring and turning occasionally, for 10 minutes.
Drain the potatoes in a colander set over a bowl, reserving the olive oil. Let cool.
In a large pot of lightly salted boiling water, add the spinach and cook for 30 seconds. Drain in a colander and run under cold water. Drain again, then roughly chop.
Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then stir in the spinach, salt and pepper.
Add 1 tablespoon of the reserved olive oil to the skillet over medium heat. Fan the potatoes out to cover the bottom of the pan and add the egg and spinach mixture.
Cook over low heat, covered, for 12 minutes. Then place the tortilla on the top rack directly under the broiler for about 2 minutes.
Remove from the oven and let cool for about 15 minutes before serving.

name: Zucchini And Mushroom Risotto With Garlic
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add rice and cook according to package instructions. Set aside

Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 3 minutes. Add zucchini and cook for 3 minutes, then add mushrooms and cook for 3 more minutes. Season with salt and pepper and mix well.
Mix in the rice and basil leaves and mix everything together. Serve immediately.

name: Summer Vegetable Rice
ingredientLines: 1 zucchini, slived and cut into triangles
Fresh cracked black pepper, to taste
instructions: Bring a pot of water to the boil. Cook the rice to package instructions. Drain and set aside to cool. Once cooled, fluff the rice using a fork.
In a separate pan, add olive oil and heat on medium heat. Add onion, a pinch of salt, and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add zucchini, saute for additional 3 minutes.
Add tomatoes, and simmer on low heat for 5 minutes. A minute or so before finishing the sauce off, add corn and stir the mixture well. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Divide the rice between plates, top with vegetable sauce and enjoy.

name: Salmon And Potato Salad
instructions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat.
Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes. Remove from hot water, cool, and peel.
While the eggs are cooking, place the potatoes in a saucepan with just enough water to cover.
Bring to a boil, and cook for 10 to 15 minutes, or until tender. Remove from heat, drain, and set aside.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onions, and saute until lightly browned and translucent, about 10 minutes.
Flake salmon and spread it over the bottom of a glass baking dish or serving dish. Spread the sauteed onions over the salmon.
Gently spread a little bit of the mayonnaise over the onion layer. Top with potatoes, and spread enough mayonnaise just to add moisture to the layer.
Finally, slice the eggs, and cover the layer of potatoes. Spread mayonnaise over the eggs, and garnish with chopped parsley.

name: Chicken And Mushrooms
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Season chicken on all sides with salt and ground black pepper.
Heat olive oil over medium-high heat in an ovenproof skillet. Place chicken skin-side down in skillet and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
Turn chicken over; stir mushrooms with a pinch of salt into skillet. Increase heat to high.
Cook, stirring mushrooms occasionally, until mushrooms shrink slightly, about 5 minutes.
Transfer skillet to the preheated oven and cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 15 to 20 minutes.
Transfer chicken breasts to a plate and loosely tent with foil; set aside.
Set skillet on the stovetop over medium-high heat; cook and stir mushrooms until brown bits start to form on the bottom of the pan, about 5 minutes.
Pour water into the skillet, and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits off of the bottom of the pan..
Cook until water is reduced by half, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat
Stir in any accumulated juices from the chicken into the skillet.
Stir ghee into mushroom mixture, stirring constantly until butter is completely melted and incorporated.
Season with salt and pepper. Spoon mushroom sauce over chicken and serve.

name: Beef Soup (Kharcho)
ingredientLines: 4 cups beef broth + 4 cup filtered water
¼ cup fresh dill, chopped, plus more to serve
¼ cup fresh parsley, chopped, plus more to serve
4 Tbsp light olive oil (or any cooking oil), divided
½ cup uncooked white rice (I used Jasmine)
2 Tbsp fresh lemon juice (from 1 medium lemon)

name: Cilantro-Lemon Cauliflower Rice
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Slice the cauliflower head in half and use a knife to remove all the florets.
Insert the grater adapter into your food processor and start feeding the cauliflower florets through the top.
Heat the olive oil in a large pan and sauté the diced onion and garlic for a few minutes, until its translucent.
Add the cauliflower rice to the pan and sauté for another 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Add in the lemon juice and zest, and chopped cilantro. Toss everything together and serve immediately.

name: Paleo Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Beat eggs in a bowl. Stir in coconut milk, salt, and pepper until well combined.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-low heat, pour in egg mixture. Cook and stir until fluffy and firm, 5 to 7 minutes.

name: Grilled Salmon With Mashed Potatoes And Spinach
instructions: Boil potatoes in water until soft. Drain potatoes and mash with milk, salt, and sour cream. Cook spinach in a pan with olive oil until wilted.
Place salmon on a grill or pan and cook for about 10 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
Serve salmon with mashed potatoes and spinach, sprinkled with red pepper and parsley.

name: Easy Canned Tuna Pasta
instructions: Bring a salted pot of water to the boil, add pasta and cook according to package directions.

When the pasta is close to being ready, add the oil to a small pan over medium heat. Once the oil is hot, add the garlic and cook it for 30 seconds. Stir in the tuna and lemon juice. Let it heat through.
Once the pasta is done, add some of the pasta water (a couple tablespoons) to the sauce. Then drain the pasta and toss with the sauce. Season with salt & pepper as needed.

name: Zucchini-Onion Scrambled Eggs
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a small bowl whisk the eggs with salt and pepper.
Heat the olive oil in a skillet. Add chopped onion and cook until golden on the medium heat. Then add zucchini and toss. Cook it for a few minutes on the medium heat.
Pour the egg mixture over the zucchini and mix well with a spatula or a wooden spoon. Cook until the eggs firming. Serve imemdiately.

name: Spinach-Garlic Scramble
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the shallot and garlic and cook until soft.
Add the spinach and cook until wilted. Season with salt and pepper. Add the eggs, and scramble as they cook. Serve immediately.

name: Carrot Pancake
instructions: Put shredded carrot, two eggs and flour into a medium bowl, add salt and mix all the ingredients well.

Heat oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat and shake the pan around to let the oil spread evenly on the bottom of the pan. Carefully place the mixture onto the pan and create three round shapes use the spatula, fry for about 5 minutes each side.

name: Creamy Mushroom Soup
instructions: Melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Saute the mushrooms, and shallots for about 5 minutes.
Mix in the flour until smooth. Gradually stir in the chicken broth. Cook, stirring, 5 minutes, or until thick and bubbly and blend.
Serve in Season with salt and pepper, and sprinkle with olive oil.

name: Greek Tomato Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat and cook onion and garlic until soft and translucent, about 3 minutes. Add rice and cook 2 minutes.
Add broth, tomato sauce, salt, and pepper and bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to low.
Cook until all the liquid is absorbed and rice is done, about 20 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Mushroom Omelette With Avocado
instructions: Crack eggs into a mixing bowl and beat with a fork.
Heat olive oil in frying pan and add chopped onion, tomatoes and mushroooms until they are soft.
Set aside vegetables and add eggs to the pan, moving them around to spread them out.
When the omelet begins to firm up, sprinkle over the vegetables.
Serve with avocado and season with black pepper and herbs of your choice.

name: Haluski
ingredientLines: ⅔ cabbage head, cored and chopped
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 300°F.
Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil. Stir in egg noodles and return to a boil.
Cook noodles uncovered, stirring occasionally, until tender but still slightly firm, about 5 minutes. Drain well.
Melt half of the butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat, cook and stir onions until translucent, 5 minutes.
Cook and stir remaining butter and cabbage into onions until cabbage is softened but not browned, 5 minutes. Season with salt and black pepper.
Place cooked noodles and cabbage mixture in a large roasting pan and stir gently to combine.  Bake for 15 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Chinese Style Meatballs
instructions: Combine ground pork, eggs, soy sauce, green onions, garlic, and ginger in a large mixing bowl.
Using gloves, mix together with your hands until all ingredients are incorporated well.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and chill in refrigerator 1 to 2 hours.
Bring a saucepan of water to a boil. Using a 1 teaspoon cookie scoop or a teaspoon, form pork mixture into small meatballs.
Cook meatballs in small batches in boiling water until they float to the top and stay there for 3 minutes.
Remove cooked meatballs from water with a slotted spoon.

name: Japanese Curry And Rice
instructions: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, bring water to a boil. Add rice and pinch of salt. Cook, covered, for 15 minutes and set aside,
Melt the butter in a small saucepan and add curry powder.
Heat olive oil and brown the chicken on all sides and transfer to a bowl.
Reduce the heat to medium and add the onions. Caramelize 10 minutes.
Add the potatoes, carrots, grated apple, and browned chicken to the caramelized onions. Pour the water over it all and stir along the bottom.
Add butter with curry and stir. Season to taste with salt and pepper, and serve with rice.

name: Spinach With Eggs
instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add in onions and cook until transparent, about 5 minutes.
Add in the spinach and season with salt and black pepper. Cook it stirring gently until the spinach leaves wilt
Make wells in the spinach mixture when it is tender enough. Crack an egg into well. Cook for 3 minutes.
Sprinkle salt and black pepper on each egg. Serve hot.

name: Penne With Zucchini And Tomatoes
instructions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add salt and pasta. Cook according to package instructions.
Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and saute fot 2 minutes or until garlic turns golden in color.
Add zucchini, parsley, and tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Add tomato sauce and toss.
Mix the pasta with zucchini sauce and serve.

name: Omelette With Tofu And Parsley
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, salt and pepper.

Spray 8-inch non-stick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over medium heat. Pour in egg mixture. As eggs set around edge of skillet, with spatula, gently push cooked portions toward center of skillet. Tilt and rotate skillet to allow uncooked egg to flow into empty spaces.
When the egg mixture is cooked, transfer to a plate. Top half of the omelette with half of tofu and half of parsley, then fold the omelette in half and repeat.
Serve immediately.

name: Grilled Garlic Shrimp Skewers
instructions: Prepare your grill for direct high heat, with one side of the grill as a cool side with no coals or flame.
While the grill is heating, thread the pre-soaked skewers through the shrimp. Start at the tail and push the skewers through the middle and end of the shrimp.
Brush shrimp with olive oil and sprinkle with salt. Place butter and garlic in a microwave-safe bowl and heat in microwave until the butter has melted and is hot.
Arrange skewers on grill so that the shrimp are over the coals or flame and the exposed bamboo skewer ends are over the cool side of the grill.
Grill for about 2 minutes on each side. As soon as the shrimp are done, remove from grill and place in a serving dish. Baste with melted garlic butter. Serve imemdiately.

name: Classic Organic Bacon And Eggs
instructions: Fry bacon in pan and set aside.
Heat olive oil in pan and add eggs that have been previously beaten in a bowl.When the eggs begin to firm up, sprinkle over the parsley and serve with crispy bacon and fresh tomatoes.

name: Spanish Potato Omlete
instructions: Heat the oil in a pan. Fry potatoes until crispy, golden and tender. Add the onion and fry until transparent. Drain all the oil.
Return potatoes and onions to the pan, arranging them in a single layer. Reduce heat down to low.
Beat eggs with salt and pepper to taste. Pour egg mixture into the pan, moving the potatoes and onions around the eggs using a plastic spatula.

Place a big, round plate on top of the pan, and flip the tortilla onto the plate. Then, slide it back into the pan carefully, moving the onion and potatoes carefully back into the pan along with the tortilla.
Keep cooking, gently shaking the pan occasionally. To remove the tortilla from the pan, place a clean plate on top of the tortilla and flip again onto the plate and serve.

name: Crispy Skin Turmeric Salmon
instructions: Using a knife, scrape off the scales from the skin of the fish fillets. Then rinse off the scales in the sink. Place on a plate and pat dry with paper towels.
Sprinkle salt and turmeric all over the flesh side of the salmon fillets. Using a pair of tongs, turn and rub on the plate to ensure they are evenly coated.
Heat olive oil in a non stick fry pan. When oil is hot, transfer the salmon fillets, flesh side down into the pan. Allow them to fry for 3 minutes per side.
Turn fillets again and fry for 1 more minute per side. Remove from pan and serve immediately, garnished with parsley and lemon.

name: Herb Omelette With Spinach
instructions: Heat the oil in a small non-stick frying pan, then cook the spinach until they start to wilt. Remove and set aside.
Meanwhile beat the eggs with the herbs, salt and plenty of freshly ground black pepper in a small bowl.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable uncooked egg to flow into the space.
Add spinach and let it set into an omelette.

name: Smoked Salmon Scramble
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a bow, whisk together the eggs, chives, and salt. Heat the oil or butter in a saute pan over medium heat.
Add the egg mixture to the pan, and cook, stirring occasionally until almost set, about 4 minutes. Stir in the salmon and continue to cook for 2 minutes longer.
Serve immediately, seasoned with pepper.

name: Steamed Salmon With Vegetables
instructions: Rinse salmon and pat dry, divide into 2 equal portions. Season with salt and pepper and drizzle with lemon juice.
In a saucepan bring to a boil vegetable broth.
Arrange vegetables in a steamer, season with salt and pepper and place salmon on top. Cover with parsley and close.
Steam over boiling broth for about 10 minutes. Remove and serve on a plate immediately.

name: Potato And Broccoli Frittata
instructions: Boil the potato in the vegetable broth with water for 5 minutes until just tender.
Meanwhile, heat oven to 400 ºF.
Mix the eggs together, then drain the potato and stir into the egg.
Cut broccoli into smaller pieces and add it to the mixture.
Heat the oil in a frying pan, then tip in the egg, potato, and broccoli mixture.
Cook over low heat for 5 minutes then cook in the oven for 15 minutes until cooked through.
You can serve with basil and season with black pepper to taste.

name: Pasta Al' Tonno
instructions: In a large pot cook spaghetti pasta with a teaspoon of oil in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain, leaving pasta moist.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium heat saute the onions and garlic in 2 tablespoons of olive oil until soft and tender, about 3 or 4 minutes.
Add the two tuna and let cook on medium for 6 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste, cooked pasta, and continue stirring.
Turn burner to high heat, add remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil and cook for 3 or 4 minutes.

name: Red Pepper Pasta
instructions: Blitz olive oil and garlic in a food processor, season well and set aside.
Bring a pan of salted water to the boil, add the pasta and cook for 1 min less than the pack instructions and drain, reserving a ladleful of cooking water.
Tip the pasta back into the pan, along with the reserved cooking water and sauce with the sliced red pepper, and return to the heat to warm through.
Tip the pasta into a bowl. Season and serve.

name: Soy-Lime Roasted Tofu
instructions: Combine soy sauce, lime juice and oil in a medium bowl or large sealable plastic bag. Add the tofu and gently toss to combine. Marinate for 20 mintues.
Preheat the oven to 450°F.
Remove the tofu from the marinade with a slotted spoon. Spread out on 2 large baking sheets, making sure the pieces are not touching.
Roast, gently turning halfway through, until golden brown, about 20 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Lemon Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Crack the eggs into a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Pour in the lemon juice. Whisk until blended.
Melt the butter in a nonstick pan over medium-low heat. When butter starts to bubble, pour in the eggs.
Start making up and down swirls in the other direction as the eggs cook, about 2 minutes.
Remove eggs from the heat. Season with salt and pepper and garnish with fresh chopped parsley.

name: Salmon With Mashed Sweet Potato
ingredientLines: 2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
instructions: Place sweet potato chunks in a large pot. Add about 1 cup water and bring to a boil. Once boiling, cover and reduce heat. Allow to simmer for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a skillet over medium-high. Once hot, place salmon skin side down and allow to cook for 5 minutes.
Flip salmon and turn off heat, allowing to cook for an additional 2 minutes. Remove from pan and set aside.
By now, the potatoes should be ready. Drain most of the water, leaving about 1/2 cup of water in the pot.
Season with salt and pepper, then mash together with a potato masher.
Plate sweet potato mash and top with salmon.

name: Summer Zucchini Garden Soup
instructions: Heat oil in 3 to 4-quart heavy saucepan over medium-low heat. Add onion, and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened and browned, about 5 minutes.
Add salt and garlic and cook an additional 5 minutes. Add chopped zucchini and cook, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes.
Add water to taste and simmer, partially covered, until tender, about 15 minutes. Puree soup in batches in a blender.
Add the basil into the blender with the last batch of soup, and quickly blend the basil. Season soup with additional salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

name: Baked Avocado Eggs With Bacon
instructions: Pre-heat the oven to 400° F.
Cut open the avocados, remove the pin, and scrape out a portion of the inside of the fruit.
Crack an egg into each avocado half. Season with salt and pepper. Drop the crumbled bacon on top of the eggs.
Place the avocados on a baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, or until the whites of the egg are set, and serve.

name: Cilantro And Parsley Shrimp
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Stir in the shrimp and onion, cook and stir until the shrimp are beginning to turn pink, about 2 minutes.
Continue cooking until the shrimp are no longer opaque in the center and the onion has turned translucent, about 4 minutes. Stir in the parsley and cilantro.
Serve on a plate with sliced avocado and tomatoes.

name: Roasted Tomatoes And Shrimp With Zoodles
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 450°F.
Place the tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet and drizzle with 1 tbsp of olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper then toss them together until coated.
Roast in the oven for 10 minutes. In a bowl toss together the shrimp, garlic, the remaining oil, salt and pepper. Remove the tomatoes from the oven.
Pour the shrimp mixture onto the baking sheet. Place the tomatoes and shrimp back in the oven and roast for 5 more minutes.
Remove from the oven and pour over the top of the zucchini noodles. Drizzle with lemon juice. Serve immediately.

name: Non-Dairy Creamy Zucchini Soup
instructions: Cut carrots and zucchini into thick slices.
Fry them in a pan with olive oil for 5 minutes.
Heat a large pan with the chicken broth and add the carrots, zucchini and tomatoes.
Simmer for 15 minutes or until soft.
Place everything in a blender and add the coconut milk and herbs of your choice.
Season with black pepper and herbs of your choice.

name: Cherry Tomato And Herb Omelette
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Pour some olive oil into a non-stick grill proof pan and tip the cut tomatoes in. Season them well and fry them off for 2 minutes.
In the meantime put a grill onto high heat and lightly beat the eggs in a bowl. Pour the beaten eggs over the tomatoes.
Quickly stir the eggs with a silicon spatula to even them out and make sure they cook evenly. Season with salt and pepper.
Slide onto a warm plate and serve immediately, topped with parsley.

name: Oven-Baked Zucchini Chips
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°F (use convection bake setting if your oven allows it).
Place sliced zucchini on paper towels and let sit for 10 minutes. Blot the tops of the zucchini with another paper towel to absorb as much moisture as possible.
Line two baking sheets with parchment paper and place the zucchini on the trays in a single layer, making sure not to overlap.
Lightly brush the zucchini with olive oil, season with salt and pepper to taste.
Place in oven and bake for about 2 hours, flipping every 30 minutes, until crispy and starting to brown. Remove crispy chips and enjoy.

name: Hard Boiled Eggs
instructions: Bring a quart of water to a boil.  Add the eggs and cook for about 10 minutes.
Strain the eggs from the water.  Let cool, remove the shells, and enjoy!

name: One-Pan Chicken, Broccoli, And Rice
ingredientLines: ½ medium yellow onion, diced finely
1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite sized pieces
2½ cups broccoli florets, cut into bite sized pieces
instructions: In a large skillet or pan, saute onions in two tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Once onions soften, increase the heat to medium high and add chicken to the pan. Brown the chicken pieces and add the garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Push chicken to one side of the pan and add additional tablespoon of olive oil to other side. Add the uncooked rice in the olive oil and saute it for a couple of minutes.
Add the chicken broth to the pan and bring the mixture to a boil. Lower the heat to a simmer and cover the pan with a lid.
Cook chicken and rice mixture covered for about 12 minutes. Sprinkle the broccoli evenly over the chicken and rice mixture and stir to combine.
Continue to cook covered another 8 minutes on low, or until broccoli and rice are both tender.

name: Tuna Rice Bowl
instructions: Cook rice in a pot of water according to the instructions on the packaging.
While rice is cooking, place tuna into a large mixing bowl and break up with a fork. Add lemon juice and parsley. Mix until thoroighly combined.
Fluff rice with a fork to separate the grains and break up any large clumps; transfer into the mixing bowl.
Mix thoroughly with a spoon until all the ingredients are evenly incorporated. Season to taste.

name: Classic Organic Bacon And Eggs
instructions: Fry bacon in pan and set aside.
Heat olive oil in pan and add eggs that have been previously beaten in a bowl.When the eggs begin to firm up, sprinkle over the parsley and serve with crispy bacon and fresh tomatoes.

name: Avocado And Tuna Salad
ingredientLines: Pinch of sea salt to taste
instructions: Chop celery and cucumbers into small cubes and cut avocado into bite-sized pieces.
Separate tuna with fork and mix it with the other ingredients.
Season with lemon juice, olive oil, and sea salt.

name: Sauteed Mushrooms In Soy Sauce Glaze
instructions: Pre-heat the frying pan to high heat and add olive oil. Add mushrooms and cook until they are golden brown. Lower heat to medium.
Add the finely chopped garlic and the soy sauce. Cook them until the mushroom absorbs the soy sauce and the garlic is golden brown.
Add parsley and cook for 30 seconds. Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Tinola
ingredientLines: <http://www amazon com gp product b006ya50dw ref=as_li_tl?ie=utf8 and camp=1789 and creative=9325 and creativeasin=b006ya50dw and linkcode=as2 and tag=foxfol09-20 and linkid=doqnmn3oyst2jn4i>

name: Tuna Macaroni Pasta
instructions: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta until al dente, rinse under cold water and drain.
In a large bowl, combine the pasta, corn, bell pepper and tuna.
Prepare the dressing by whisking together the mayonnaise and pepper. Add to pasta salad. Garnish with basil. Drizzle with flaxseed oil.

name: Scampi With Butter And Lemon
instructions: In a skillet, saute garlic in butter and oil for 2 minutes.
Add the shrimp, lemon juice, and pepper. Cook and stir until the shrimp turn pink, 5 minutes.

name: Sweet And Spicy Apple Coleslaw
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
2 tbsp flat leaf parsley, roughly chopped
instructions: Place the shredded cabbage and apple in a mixing bowl and toss to combine.
In a small glass measuring cup or bowl, whisk together the mayo, juice, honey, salt and pepper until smooth.
Pour the dressing over the cabbage mixture and toss to combine. Let rest for 5 minutes before enjoying.

name: Zucchini And Potato Scrambled Eggs
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
Place the vegetables on a lined tray. Drizzle them with olive oil and add the salt and pepper. Cook for 25 minutes.
Meanwhile in a bowl, crack the eggs, add the parsley and whisk them with a fork to combine well.
Use a frying pan at a medium to high heat and add the vegetables with the eggs. Stir them together until the eggs are cooked. Serve topped with lemon juice.

name: Tuna Stuffed Avocado
ingredientLines: ½ cup coriander, roughly chopped, divided
instructions: Scoop out some of the avocado from the pitted area to widen the "bowl" area. Slice the avocado into cubes and put in a mixing bowl.
Add the tuna, tomatoes and ¼ cup cilantro to the mixing bowl. Pour lime juice over and stir it all together until everything is well mixed.
Scoop the tuna into the avocado bowls. Season with salt, pepper and the remaining coriander.

name: Avocado Slices
instructions: Cut the avocado in half and remove the seed. Remove the skin, slice and enjoy!

name: Bacon-Wrapped Avocado Wedges
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 400°F.
Cut avocado in half, remove pit and peel. Cut each half into slices. Wrap 1 bacon slice around each avocado wedge.
Place wedges in a single layer on tray in air-fryer basket and cook until bacon is cooked through, about 10 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Apple With Almond Butter
instructions: Wash the apple then core and slice. Spread slices with almond butter or serve on the side.

name: Fresh Pineapple Chunks
instructions: Peel and cut pineapple into 6-8 slices. Serve and enjoy!

name: Baked Chicken, Potatoes And Carrots
ingredientLines: 1 lb potatoes, peeled and cut into quarters
1 lb carrots, peeled and cut into chunks
1 yellow onion, peeled and cut into large chunks
Fresh cracked black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
In a large baking dish scatter the onions, garlic, potatoes and carrots, season using salt and pepper to taste. Add olive oil and toss to coat the veggies.
Season chicken with salt and pepper and drizzle with the remaining olive oil. Massage the oil into the chicken for a minute or so.
Bake the veggies for 20 minutes, add the chicken on top and continue to bake for 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is nice and done-through.
Allow to cool down a bit before serving with a sprinkling of fresh parsley.

name: Tomato-Tuna Penne
ingredientLines: 6 oz tuna in olive oil, drained
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook according to package instructions. Drain, mix in 1 tbsp of olive oil and set aside.
Pour remaining olive oil into a pan over medium heat. Put the garlic and saute. Add in the basil, tomatoes and tomato sauce and cook for 6 minutes.
Add tuna and cook for 6 minutes. Mix in the pasta and season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

name: Garlic-Broccoli Stir Fry With Shrimp
ingredientLines: ¾ lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
instructions: Heat 2 tbsp of sesame oil in a large, nonstick skillet over medium heat. Pour in the shrimp and season with salt.
Fry the shrimp for 1 minute on each side. Remove the shrimp from the pan and pour in the remaining oil.
Toss in the onion and salt and saute for a few minutes until they begin to soften. Add in the broccoli, garlic and soy sauce and saute for 30 seconds.
Toss the shrimp back into the pan and mix until everything is well incorporated and the shrimp is fully cooked, about 1 minute.
Serve immediately.

name: Keto Garlic-Shrimp Zoodles
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Spiralize the zucchini. Set aside.
Add the olive oil and lemon juice to a skillet on medium heat. Once the pan is warm, add the shrimp. Cook the shrimp for one minute per side.
Add the garlic. Cook for an additional minute, stirring often. Add the zucchini noodles and stirconstantly for 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper and sprinkle with the chopped parlsey. Serve immediately.

name: Avocado And Tuna Salad
ingredientLines: Pinch of sea salt to taste
instructions: Chop celery and cucumbers into small cubes and cut avocado into bite-sized pieces.
Separate tuna with fork and mix it with the other ingredients.
Season with lemon juice, olive oil, and sea salt.

name: Kale And Sweet Potato Soup
instructions: In a large saucepan warm the olive oil over medium heat.
Sauté red pepper until it is soft, about 5 minutes.

Add chopped sweet potatoes, turmeric, ginger and the chicken broth and enough water to cover by 1 inch.Bring soup to a boil, cover, reduce heat and simmer until vegetables are very tender, about 20 minutes.Puree the soup with a vertical blender. Add sea salt and kale, cover, and cook an additional 10 minutes.

name: Stir-Fried Cabbage
ingredientLines: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a wok or large carbon steel or stainless steel skillet, heat oil over high heat until just smoking. Move wok off-heat, add the garlic, and cook for 30 seconds.
Return wok to high heat, add the cabbage and peanuts, and cook, stirring and tossing rapidly to ensure garlic doesn’t burn and cabbage is evenly coated in oil.
Continue to cook and begin to carefully add a few drops of water, in ¼ tsp increments around the sides of the wok, for 2 minutes.
Add fish sauce around the sides of the wok, and continue to cook, tossing and stirring constantly, until fish sauce is fully absorbed into the cabbage, around 30 seconds.
Season to taste with pepper, transfer to a serving plate, and serve immediately.

name: Spiced Apple Slices For Two
text: Spiced Apple Slices for Two recipes
ingredientLines: 1 large baking apple, cored, peeled and thinly sliced (Granny Smith works well)
2 tablespoons butter or 2 tablespoons margarine, melted

name: Paleo Cauliflower Rice
instructions: Place cauliflower chunks in a food processor and pulse until broken down into rice-size pieces.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, add cauliflower 'rice', cumin, salt, and pepper.
Cover skillet and cook until heated through, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove lid and fluff 'rice' with a fork.

name: Keto Bacon-Wrapped Avocado Fries
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Peel avocado and cut into wedges. Wrap each wedge of avocado with a 1/2 slice or full slice of bacon depending on size.
Place all on a baking sheet pan with a little room in between.
Bake in the oven for 20 minutes depending on how thick your bacon is to desired crispness.

name: Avocado With Tomato
instructions: Cut the avocado in half and remove the core.
Cut the tomato into large pieces.
Remove the peel and mix with pieces of tomato. Salt and pepper to taste. Enjoy!

name: Cucumber Spears
instructions: Trim and peel the cucumberscut into 6-8 spears. Serve and enjoy!

name: Easy Keto Barbecue Chicken Thighs
instructions: Preheat an outdoor grill to 350°F. Oil the grate.
Season each side of the chicken thighs with salt and pepper. Place inner side of each chicken thigh on the preheated grill.
Bush the top of each with 1 tablespoon barbecue sauce. Grill undisturbed for 3 minutes, watching for flare-ups.
Move chicken pieces to another part of the grill if flare-ups occur.
Turn chicken pieces and brush each side with an additional 1 tablespoon barbecue sauce.
Grill, turning the pieces three more times, about 6 minutes per side. Serve with additional sauce.

name: Soy-Lime Roasted Tofu
instructions: Combine soy sauce, lime juice and oil in a medium bowl or large sealable plastic bag. Add the tofu and gently toss to combine. Marinate for 20 mintues.
Preheat the oven to 450°F.
Remove the tofu from the marinade with a slotted spoon. Spread out on 2 large baking sheets, making sure the pieces are not touching.
Roast, gently turning halfway through, until golden brown, about 20 minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Avocado With Lemon Juice
instructions: Cut avocado into bite-sized pieces.
Drizzle with lemon juice and top with a pinch of black pepper.

name: Garlic Shrimp Pasta
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a strong boil. Add pasta and cook for 9 to 13 minutes, do not overcook
Mix broth, garlic, parsley, lemon juice and pepper in saucepan. Heat to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Add shrimp and cook for 5 minutes.

name: Salmon Sashimi
instructions: Cut wafer-thin slices on the diagonal, as you would smoked salmon.
Arrange a layer of the salmon over a large shallow dish, then spoon over a little of the lemon juice and olive oil.
Season with black pepper.

name: Mango Chunks
instructions: Peel the mango. Serve and enjoy!

name: Arroz Rojo
instructions: Grate tomato into a bowl using a box grater; discard tomato skins.
Heat vegetable oil in a heavy skillet over medium-high heat and cook onion until translucent, stirring often, about 5 minutes.
Stir garlic into onion and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Stir rice into onion mixture and cook, stirring often, until rice is lightly toasted, about 3 more minutes.
Stir grated tomato, broth, and tomato sauce into the rice. Bring mixture to a boil.
Mix in jalapeno pepper, cilantro, and salt; reduce heat to low.
Cover skillet and simmer until rice has absorbed the liquid, about 15 minutes.
Turn off heat and let rice stand covered for 8 minutes. Fluff with a fork before transferring rice to a serving dish.

name: Low Carb Zucchini Chips
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°F.
Arrange sliced zucchini on a baking sheet. Drizzle lightly with olive oil and sprinkle lightly with sea salt.
Bake in the preheated oven until completely dried and chip-like, about 1 hour per side. Allow to cool before serving.

name: Fried Salmon With Ratatouille
ingredientLines: 1 garlic clove, peeled and finely chopped
instructions: Place a saucepan on medium heat and add olive oil, the chopped garlic and fry until golden brown, add tomato sauce and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat, simmer.
Place frypan on heat and add olive oil, add eggplant and cook until coloured and almost soft, drain eggplant and set aside.
Place the pan back on heat and add olive oil, add the onion and toss, add pepper and zucchini, cook until nicely colored, remove from heat and drain oil.
Add the vegetables to the reduced tomato, add basil and keep warm.
Place grill pan on heat, brush salmon with oil, when pan is hot add salmon and grill on each side. Serve with warm ratatouille.

name: Carrot And Cabbage Slaw
instructions: Wash and peel the carrots.
Grate the carrots and mix with the cabbage slaw. Enjoy!

name: Edamame
ingredientLines: 3/4 cup frozen edamame in the pod
instructions: Place edamame in a microwave-safe container.
Heat on high for 3 minutes.
Let cool for a minute then serve.

name: Zucchini Spears
instructions: Trim ends of zucchini.
Cut in half, widthwise, then cut each half into 4 spears.
Enjoy!

name: Apple With Almond Butter
instructions: Wash the apple then core and slice. Spread slices with almond butter or serve on the side.

name: Broccoli Florets
instructions: Wash the broccoli florets. Serve and enjoy!

name: Bacon Avocado Fries
instructions: Preheat oven to 425ºF.
Slice each avocado into wedges. Wrap each wedge in bacon, cutting the bacon if needed. Place on a baking sheet, seam side down.
Bake until bacon is cooked through and crispy, 15 minutes.

name: Celery With Peanut Butter
instructions: Use the celery sticks to dip into the peanut butter or spread the peanut butter on the celery sticks before serving them on a platter.

name: Dried Mango Slices
instructions: Serve the slices of dried mango. Enjoy!
